original_title: Sri Lanka stock market continues upward momentum
original_body_lines: The Colombo Stock Exchange’s All-Share Price Index (ASPI) continued its upward momentum today (July 05), gaining 99.49 points at the end of trading today to close at 10,176.13 points.
Meanwhile, the S&P SL20 index also moved up by 35.97 points to close at 3,009.09 points at the end of today’s trading, recording an increase of 1.21 per cent.
The market generated a turnover of more than Rs. 4.945 billion today.
